O

open() - Method in class org.netbeans.api.options.OptionsDisplayer
Open the options dialog (in non-modal mode) with no guarantee which category is pre-selected.
open(String) - Method in class org.netbeans.api.options.OptionsDisplayer
Open the options dialog (in non-modal mode) with some panel preselected.
open(boolean) - Method in class org.netbeans.api.options.OptionsDisplayer
Open the options dialog with no guarantee which category is pre-selected.
open(String, boolean) - Method in class org.netbeans.api.options.OptionsDisplayer
Open the options dialog with some panel preselected.
OptionsCategory - Class in org.netbeans.spi.options
This class represents one category (like "Fonts & Colors" or "Editor") in Options Dialog.
OptionsCategory() - Constructor for class org.netbeans.spi.options.OptionsCategory
 
OptionsDisplayer - Class in org.netbeans.api.options
Permits Options Dialog to open the options dialog with some category pre-selected.
OptionsPanelController - Class in org.netbeans.spi.options
PanelController creates visual representation of one Options Dialog category, and manages communication between Options Dialog and this panel.
OptionsPanelController() - Constructor for class org.netbeans.spi.options.OptionsPanelController
 
OptionsPanelController.ContainerRegistration - Annotation Type in org.netbeans.spi.options
Registers a panel with child panels at the top level of the Options dialog.
OptionsPanelController.Keywords - Annotation Type in org.netbeans.spi.options
Registers keywords for some panel in the Options dialog.
OptionsPanelController.KeywordsRegistration - Annotation Type in org.netbeans.spi.options
Similar to OptionsPanelController.Keywords but permits multiple registrations of one class.
OptionsPanelController.SubRegistration - Annotation Type in org.netbeans.spi.options
Registers a subpanel inside a top-level container panel in the Options dialog.
OptionsPanelController.TopLevelRegistration - Annotation Type in org.netbeans.spi.options
Registers a simple panel at the top level of the Options dialog.
org.netbeans.api.options - package org.netbeans.api.options
 
org.netbeans.spi.options - package org.netbeans.spi.options
